about_the_game:
Demo of Skybase, a sandbox spaceship building and space exploration game.

Starting for a basic simple spaceship - enjoy exploring space, eliminate enemies you come across, and mine different metals and materials needed to fix or expand your ship.

Build any type of spaceship that you desire by simply spawning a ship core and adding various blocks to it in any way shape or form that you want.

Each block is crafted from different materials and metals that you mine around, with each one having different purposes assigned to them: Some are used as effective shielding to your spaceship, while others act as weapons or mining tools.

It is even possible to attach several ships together to a single mothership that you control and explore with.

Demo limitations:
1) Save/load not available.
2) 30 minutes limitation for a each play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, GTX 750 Ti 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support OpenCL
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, GTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support OpenCL

short_description: Demo of Skybase, a spaceship building sandbox game. Build various spaceships from scratch and explore the cosmos. Fight different enemies and mine metals and materials to fix or expand your spaceship fleet.
